name: Serial Killer
description:
Hey there! Have you ever been wondering when Fortnite will be on Scratch? Well, now it is! (Just that it's 2d). Play online with friends or other people online! (Note to New Scratchers. You can't play. you need to be Scratcher) |

In-game: You start with 10-15+ online players/a few bots and try to be the last one standing. Do that by getting kills. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~Instructions down below ⇣~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Instructions~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WARNING

This game may cause rage as real Fortnite. Play at your own risk! And this is NOT mobile-friendly!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

W/Space - To jump/Jump off the battle bus

A - Left

D - Right

R - Reload

Pickup Gun - Touch gun with mouse+e

1-2-3-4-5 - Switch weapons

Or

Up arrow - Jump

Left arrow - Left

Right arrow - Right

R - Reload

Pickup Gun - Touch gun with mouse+e

1-2-3-4-5 - Switch weapons

IMPORTANT ⇣

Weapon Glow Meanings 

Grey Glow - Common weapon 

Green Glow - Uncommon weapon

Blue Glow - Rare weapon

Purple Glow - Epic weapon

Yellow Glow - Legendary weapon

Brown Glow - Mythic weapon

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

(Future space)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Legend

Person icon - Players online/Bots (In game)

Target icon - Kills

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Leaderboards

(Sorry I found a way where people could hack it and be at the top so I disabled it until I can find a way to fix it)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Save codes

Click on "Profile". Click "Save/Load data to save/load a game.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Modes

There are 6 modes.

Solo, Close Encounters, Sniper Shootout, Spray And Play, Solid Gold, and Playground are the 6 modes

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
